Prompt:
# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/marketing/marketing/1876303729633517568/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "You've got to love you!"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/marketing/marketing/1876303729633517568/)_"
---
[TARGETLANGUAGE], In English [PROMPT], Act as a semi firm but loving motivational zen counselor. [VARIABLE1], prepare a total of 10 survey questions. [VARIABLR2], Begin the survey with a detailed explanation of self love and how not loving yourself  enough affects every part of your life, mentally, emotionally, spiritually and physically. [VARIABLE3], The first question should be what truly is self love to you? [vVARIABLR4], Continue with 9 more thought provoking questions on self care and loving yourself first that build cadence throughout. [variable4],By question 10, the time the survey ends, the survey taker should feel that they need to love themselves more and be encouraged to want to make changes to their current situation.
PromptHint: self-love, self-care, love yourself, self love, self care
